name: Thing (Regamer)
description:
You had an accident  fell off the roof. And suddenly you become strange person (or persons), bringing you on a mission to nowhere. To return to a normal life, a special artifact much be recovered which is hidden from prying eyes in a repository. If you do not, he threatens to self destruct and that means you're dead. Not seeing any other way you agree to help.

Controls:
A - go left
D - go right
space - jump
LMB - action, raise, select the item from the slot
RMB - Reset selection object, remove the text
MMB - select a group of objects from the slots, a very important button so do not forget about it!
